modName: A camo Retexture for Triss Armor Retextured
summary: A camo Retexture for Triss Armor Retextured,a replacement which will replace the  darkbrown.dds.
descriptionHtml:
========================
make sure you install Triss Armor Retextured first
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708
========================

A camo Retexture for Triss Armor Retextured,
a replacement which will replace the dds textture in \\textures\\armor\\psyold\\triss\\
not all of them yet.
files will be seperated ,you can only replace the one you want to replace.

for now(2013.01.23),there are 2 texture
1.darkbrown.dds (all 5 screenshot)
2.darkgreen.dds (no screenshot yet)

see the pics for details.

install with mod manager will be fine.

credits
all goes to Triss Armor Retextured
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708
author: zxdong262
